doc.title: The Drift King Keiichi Tsuchiya's Drift Bible: A Complete Guide to Drifting
doc.plot: In three distinct segments, Keiichi Tsuchiya demonstrates the six basic forms of drifting (E-Brake, Shift Lock, Power Over, Braking, Feint & Lift-Off), how to practice these driving techniques, and how best to tune a car for drifting and drift-racing. Keiichi also demonstrates his skill in a variety of cars, including, the AE86 Trueno (Toyota Corolla GT-S), the S13 Silvia (Nissan first-generation 240SX), the S14 Silvia (Nissan second-generation 240SX), and an SW20 (Toyota first-generation MR2). Afterwards, Best Motoring International adds in a 10-minute video of footage from the 2003 SEMA show. An invaluable tool to anyone who is interested in the growing automotive trend of drifting.
